commands.name: ZDStream
commands.description: This will return all the chat that users have with the Bot, this could be of any type (IM/MIM and ROOMs)

commands.name: ZDBlast
commands.description: Sends a message to all IM/MIM or ROOMs or even all Types with a specific message
commands.param:
TYPE = 'IM', 'ROOM' or 'ALL'

TXT = text of message to blast
commands.example: /ZDBlast IM The bot has been updated

commands.name: status
commands.description: Returns the status of SymphonyZendeskBot. This command bypasses the Command Queue.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Tells you what the bot can do.

commands.name: mention
commands.description: @mentions all members of a stream/room to look at posted message
commands.example: /all This is an important message bla bla
